sections.title: What is a Conversion Factor?
content: A conversion factor is a ratio that expresses how many of one unit equals another unit.

sections.title: How to Convert Units
content: Step 2: Multiply by the factor that cancels the old unit.

flashcards.question: What is a conversion factor?
flashcards.answer: A ratio that relates one unit to another.
